profile_positions.description:
I am back at Philips! Philips Engineering Solutions is an energising hightech place to work. For me it's a new challenge in a discipline I love, working on things that matter and add value.
Check out out website: 
https://www.engineeringsolutions.philips.com/launch-philips-engineering-solutions/?gclid=EAIaIQobChMIk8ffwO_48QIVBywYCh1ckgm_EAAYASAAEgKJDPD_BwE

Micro Electromechanic Systems & Micro Devices (MMD).
MMD is one of the 7 key area's of expertise of Philips Engineering Solutions. MMD designs, develops and manufactures custom microelectromechanical systems (MEMS) and assemble micro devices. Our 140 experts working at the MEMS Foundry and Micro Devices Facility follow a phase-gated approach to demonstrate the feasibility and give proof of concept, develop the process to the required maturity level and manufacture your devices with the right quality.

Some background info, what is MEMS technology? 
Micro electro-mechanical systems, or MEMS, is a process technology used to create tiny integrated devices or systems that have both mechanical and electronic components. The functional elements of MEMS are for example: minitiaturized structures, sensors, actuators and microelectronics. You wil find these devices implemented in e.g. medical applications (pressure sensors, transducers for hearing aids, microfluidics, microsurgical and diagnostical tools, etc) and applied in a wealth of Industrial and commercial products (printer heads, smart phones, the airbags on your car, etc.. etc..).

profile_positions.description:
PANalytical is the world's leading supplier of equipment for X-ray materials analysis. Our equipment is used for R&D, for industrial process control applications and for semiconductor metrology.

Our products are used to analyse food and medicines to verify if the desired ingredients are used (and to warn for undesired substances). They are used by manufacturers of steel, cement and other construction materials to insure that our homes, offices, schools, public place are safe, functional, fun and environmental friendly. And last but not least scientist use our technology to investigate new materials and methods that improve our quality of life and help to protect our environment.

X-ray equipment competence and supply centers are located on two sites in the Netherlands: Almelo (development and production of X-ray instruments) and Eindhoven (development and production of X-ray tubes).

I manage the Equipment Engineering & Maintenance department of PANalytical Eindhoven. My department is responsible for the development and maintenance of the diverse and complex equipment and tooling portfolio used at our  Development and Manufacturing departments. My additional responsibilities are: Manager Technical Facilities, Coordinator Radiation Safety and Manager of the emergency response team.

PANalytical is a great company to work for. There is a great atmosphere. Our processes and technology are very challenging. PANalytical takes her Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR, Dutch: MVO) and scored high (27th) in recent Dutch "Best Employer" ranking for companies < 1000 employees: check it out at:

(note: if one would filter the ranking and select on (high-) tech companies we would be amongs the medal winners...;-).                                                                                                                   
Come visit us during the annual Dutch Technology Week!!

profile_positions.description: ASML's is THE market leader in high-tech lithography, metrology and software solutions for the semiconductor industry. There is a lot of high tech machinery required at the site of an IC manufacturer like Intel, Infineon or NXP to provide the actual lithography process. It is a complex system with a.o. a significant amount of Mechatronics involved. Large and heavy parts of the lithography machine are positioned at high speed and high accuracy in the optical path. This requires a lot of power electronics and electronics controls (mechatronics). At ASML, I was responsible as team leader for the so-called "Power Cabinets" which provide this functionality (controls, power electronics, mechanics, cooling, etc). The manufacturing of these power cabinets was done at external partners and the design of new generations power cabinets was a co-development with those partners.
profile_positions.title: Team Leader / Outsource manager

profile_positions.description:
My group developed a.o. the successful lamp driver platform called the CosmoPolis Xtreme driver. It is a uProcessor controlled power electronics lamp driver platform with communication features. We busted the myth that electronics and outdoor are incompatible. 
The Xtreme platform performs unrivalled in robustness and quality so-far in the outdoor market. Check out the video I shot with two of my team members ("my portfolio" 2nd link). The clip is not about formal stress testing. It gives you a flavor though of what we mean by Xtreme. Use some decent audio volume, it's fun!
The CosmoPolis Outdoor Lighting system is a so-called Philips "green flag ship". A product that helps preserve the environment for the generations to come. We contribute! See "my portfolio", 1st link.

profile_positions.description: LumiLeds is a leader in Solid State (LED) lighting. I joined LumiLeds to build and manage the European electronics development team, one of the groups in the systems R&D department. This multi- disciplinary R&D dept (Optics, Solid State physics, Thermal design, Mechanics, Electronics) developed a full range of LED based Traffic Signals. The team was very successfull and our product conquered the US market in a breathtaking pace. Later we layed down the fundaments of LED based LCD backlighting (LED TV). My role included Project Management, Electronics Group Mgt, IP generation (several patents); Make or buy decisions; Electronics partner selection (for co-development and mfg) and partner mgt; Intermediate for development partners at Philips, Delta Electronics, Dialight and Mascot Electronics; Intermediate for US and EU based Traffic Management equipment manufacturers and Governmental institutes like Nema, Caltrans, Rijks Water Staat. LumiLeds was a thrill....

Field of expertise were a.o. motor drives, control feedback loop electronics, (Assembleon, ASML, etc), electronics for industrial processes like Electro Chemical Processing (Shaver mfg) and high power UV processing (TV masks).
